verses.verse: Thus all the <S%H4399>work<s%> that <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H7999>finished.<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> in the <S%H6944>things<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H6944>dedicated,<s%> even the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and all the <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them in the <S%H214>treasuries<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

Then <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and all the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes,<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' households of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to bring <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> which is <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>
And all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> themselves to the <S%H4428>king<s%> at the <S%H2282>feast,<s%> which was in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>
All the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came:<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> took <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark;<s%>

and they brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> and all the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> that were in the <S%H168>Tent;<s%> these the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> brought <S%H5927>up.<s%>

<S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> and all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that were <S%H3259>assembled<s%> to <S%H6440>him,<s%> were before the <S%H727>ark,<s%> <S%H2076>sacrificing<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> that could not be <S%H5608>counted<s%> nor <S%H4487>numbered<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priests<s%> brought <S%H935>in<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to its <S%H4725>place,<s%> into the <S%H1687>oracle<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> to the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3671>place,<s%> even under the wings of the <S%H3742>cherubim.<s%>

For the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%> over the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> and its <S%H905>poles<s%> <S%H4605>above.<s%>

The <S%H905>poles<s%> were so <S%H748>long<s%> that the <S%H7218>ends<s%> of the <S%H905>poles<s%> were <S%H7200>seen<s%> from the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1687>oracle;<s%> but they were not <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2351>outside:<s%> and there it is to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

There was nothing in the <S%H727>ark<s%> except the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> at <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> when <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a covenant with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when they came <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

It <S%H3548>happened,<s%> when the priests had come <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3548>place,<s%> (for all the priests who were <S%H4672>present<s%> had <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H8104>themselves,<s%> and didn't keep their <S%H4256>divisions;<s%>

also the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> who were the <S%H7891>singers,<s%> all of <S%H623>them,<s%> even Asaph, <S%H1968>Heman,<s%> <S%H3038>Jeduthun,<s%> and their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H3847>arrayed<s%> in fine <S%H948>linen,<s%> with <S%H4700>cymbals<s%> and stringed <S%H5035>instruments<s%> and <S%H3658>harps,<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the east <S%H4217>end<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and with them one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H2690>sounding<s%> with <S%H2689>trumpets;<s%>)

it <S%H2690>happened,<s%> when the trumpeters and <S%H7891>singers<s%> were as <S%H259>one,<s%> to make <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6963>sound<s%> to be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in <S%H1984>praising<s%> and <S%H3034>thanking<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and when they lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> their <S%H6963>voice<s%> with the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> and <S%H4700>cymbals<s%> and <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H7892>music,<s%> and <S%H1984>praised<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H2896>saying,<s%> "For he is good; for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever!<s%>" that then the <S%H1004>house<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with a <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> even the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%>

so that the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5975>stand<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud:<s%> for the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>
